title: four-electrocuted-as-high-tension-wire-snaps
news:
SINDHUPALCHOK, DEC 21 - 
	Four people were  electrocuted  when a moving bus came in contact with a live wire here at Kattike in the district on Sunday.



The deceased--two each women and men--were commuting by the bus. Their identity have not been established.



The bus heading for Jalbire from Kathmandu came in contact with a high tension wire after it snapped.



The details of the incident have yet to come.
